org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cluster

Interface IgniteChangeGlobalStateSupport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IgnitePageStoreManager, IgniteWriteAheadLogManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicDataStructureProxy, DataStructuresProcessor, FilePageStoreManager, FileWriteAheadLogManager, FsyncModeFileWriteAheadLogManager, GridCacheAtomicLongImpl, GridCacheAtomicReferenceImpl, GridCacheAtomicSequenceImpl, GridCacheAtomicStampedImpl, GridCacheCountDownLatchImpl, GridCacheDatabaseSharedManager, GridCacheLockImpl, GridCacheSemaphoreImpl, GridServiceProcessor, GridTaskProcessor, IgfsNoopProcessor, IgfsProcessor, IgfsProcessorAdapter, IgniteCacheDatabaseSharedManager, IgniteCacheSnapshotManager

    public interface IgniteChangeGlobalStateSupport
    Provides callback during activation/deactivation cluster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActivate(GridKernalContext kctx)
      Called when cluster performing activation.
      void onDeActivate(GridKernalContext kctx)
      Called when cluster performing deactivation.
